title: "BIOL 346 An Ecological Perspective"
---

## Course Overview

This course examines sustainability by integrating environmental science, ecology, and socio-cultural perspectives to understand how natural systems function, how human societies depend on them, and how technological and economic choices shape environmental outcomes. Students evaluate environmental problems and potential pathways to a sustainable future by applying physical and biological principles, analyzing tradeoffs, and considering ecological, social, economic, and political dimensions of sustainability.
